name: Pocket Hero-Wars of Mini Tanks
description:
Be careful the Reflected shells everywhere！You die or enemy die, 3 seconds, after encounter!
Pick up the various weapons of the map to help you win the fight!
This is easy-to-learn action-packed fighting, an arena for serious competitions. Take out your enemies with kinds of weapons. Battle against cunning enemies and become the Tank Hero!

The features:
- Dozens of different terrain maps.
- Multiple enemy tanks with different abilities.
- All kinds of weapons help you to win.
- More features await your discovery.

Exciting gameplay is waiting for you!Turn your tank into death machine!
So … get ready for battle!
